head.title: Lynne Stewart, Bank Officer, Plans April Wedding

hedline.hl1: Lynne Stewart, Bank Officer, Plans April Wedding

block.p: Mr. and Mrs. Richard A. Stewart of Meadville, Pa., have announced the engagement of their daughter Lynne Adair Stewart to Jefferson Davis Herrman 3d, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Herrman 2d of Hewlett, L.I. An April wedding is planned.

Miss Stewart, 28 years old, is a senior operations officer for the Riggs National Bank in Washington. She is a graduate of Allegheny College, where her father is the director of alumni affairs, and she received an M.B.A. from American University. Her mother, Mae Stewart, is a registered nurse.

Mr. Herrman, 29, is an operations manager for Circuit City Stores of Northern Virginia in Potomac Mills, Va. He graduated from the Loomis Chaffee School and Franklin and Marshall College. His mother, Mary Herrman, is a researcher for Projects Plus, a special-events coordinator in New York. His father retired as a vice president of Lawrence Metal Products in Bay Shore, L.I.

Miss Stewart, 28 years old, is a senior operations officer for the Riggs National Bank in Washington. She is a graduate of Allegheny College, where her father is the director of alumni affairs, and she received an M.B.A. from American University. Her mother, Mae Stewart, is a registered nurse.

Mr. Herrman, 29, is an operations manager for Circuit City Stores of Northern Virginia in Potomac Mills, Va. He graduated from the Loomis Chaffee School and Franklin and Marshall College. His mother, Mary Herrman, is a researcher for Projects Plus, a special-events coordinator in New York. His father retired as a vice president of Lawrence Metal Products in Bay Shore, L.I.
